name: Developer Portfolio
description: This is my personal developer portfolio, a work in progress to show my skills and test new things!

name: BestMeals API
description: BestMealsAPI is an API designed to allow users to rate dishes, generating a ranking of the best options in the city. To validate the idea, an MVP was created that enables registering meals, assigning ratings, and viewing the top-rated dishes.

name: ATT Notes
description: Audio-to-text notes is note creation tool that automatically transcripts audio into text and saves data to localstorage only.

name: BR Advocacia
description: Layout created to simulate a lawyer's website.

name: Wookie Pizza
description: The project is a pizzeria menu, made for order customization, also counting with 'pizza of the day' promotion and a points system. It was made in a 4 day period limit to test what I could accomplish in said time.
